price: Yoo obsan, ibiddi teessoo isaaniiti, yoo ceephoo buufachuu barbaadan, isaan warra ceephefamu irraayii miti.
arabic: فَإِن يَصۡبِرُواْ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَسۡتَعۡتِبُواْ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُعۡتَبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-in yaṣbirū fal-nāru mathwan lahum wa-in yastaʿtibū famā hum mina al-muʿ'tabīna
